record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - July 12, 2007)

[Page: S9185]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that MAJ Pamela Powers, an Air Force fellow in Senator Collins' office, be granted the privilege of the floor for the duration of the consideration of H.R. 1585.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Felix Hernandez, a State Department Pearson Fellow with my office, be granted the privilege of the Floor during debate on H.R. 1585, the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2008, that is currently before us.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
